name: Drumlin Fully Secure Mobile PDF File

description: Drumlin Security develops both the Drumlin PDF Reader/Publisher and the Javelin PDF Reader. The Drumlin PDF Reader/Publisher software converts .PDF files to the secured DRMX or DRMZ formats. Javelin PDF Reader software enables any PDF file, such as a report, manual, or book to be distributed securely to anyone, anywhere in the world.
NOTE: This file is similar to the .DRMX file, the only difference is that DRMZ is compatible with iPad and Android devices.
